name: Novel Writing Simulator
description:
Experience the drama of Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice by typing it yourself!

Features:

  • The joy of writing a critically acclaimed public domain novel
  • Over 30 hours of gameplay
  • Over 100,000 words
  • Type Assist - type the right letter every time, no matter what key you press
  • Auto Save - pick up where you left off from your previous session

Notes on Donations:

  • 10% of donations will go to support itch.io.
  • 90% of donations will go to helping me pay off the over $130,000 of student loan debt I accrued in building skills that make Novel Writing Simulator possible.
